title: Bug 13620 - The Java Source Attachment Preference Page has excessive white space in the text
description: When accessing the Java Source Attachment Preference Page, there is a significant amount of white space in the text, causing the page to appear incorrectly formatted.
OB: The Java Source Attachment Preference Page displays text with excessive white space.
EB: The Java Source Attachment Preference Page should display text without excessive white space.
SR: Ensure that the vertical alignment of the text on the Java Source Attachment Preference Page is set to SWT.ALIGN_BEGINNING.
